name: rukia
title: Rukia
desc: Built with the latest version of Tailwind CSS, every part is structured into components for effortless customization and easy integration.
article:
If you're launching a new product or looking for a fresh template, Rukia is the perfect choice. Its bold design puts your product in the spotlight, ensuring maximum impact.


Built with the latest version of Tailwind CSS, every part is structured into components for effortless customization and easy integration.


Pages included:

  1. Home
  2. Pricing
  3. Integrations
  4. About
  5. Blog / Posts
  6. Contact
  7. Legal Pages (Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, etc.)


Dependencies used in this project:

  • TailwindCSS
  • GSAP
  • Remix Icon
